SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_GETREVENUE
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Technical Training
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL: create function dbo.USR_UFN_CONSTITUENT_GETREVENUE ( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) returns table as return ( select [ID] ,[DATE] ,[AMOUNT] ,[SOURCECODE] ,[FINDERNUMBER] ,[APPEALID] ,[MAILINGID] ,[CHANNELCODEID] ,[GIVENANONYMOUSLY] ,[DONOTACKNOWLEDGE] ,[TRANSACTIONTYPE] from dbo.REVENUE where CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID );
